panels.content:
### Cassandra SLA Dashboard
#### This dashboard provides the following informations :
_User metrics_
* __max latencies by percentile__ : read / write / scan
* __OPS__ : read / write
* __Disk usage__ : live space / total space
* __JAVA heap & non heap usage__ : current memory / max allowed

_Advanced metrics_
* __Pending operations__ :  compactions / flushes
* __Streaming & CommitLog__ : OPS / throughput
* __Repair ratio__ : for every keyspace
* __Memtable statistics__
* __Row cache__ : hit rates
* __Thread pools metrics__ : OPS / blocked / pending
